clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Silicone Suspension on Standing Balance for Transfemoral Amputees
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Silicone Suspension on Standing Balance for Transfemoral Amputees

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this study is to test the hypothesis that silicone suction suspension without additional belt support does not significantly diminish the postural sway or walking performance of persons with transfemoral amputation.

clinical_study.why_stopped: poor recruitment, pilot outcome measures inappropriate
